<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/scorecards"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This route allows you to fetch all scorecards in your Port organization.<br/><br/>To learn more about scorecards, check out the [documentation](https://docs.getport.io/promote-scorecards/).
